value:
$WmMPID_花嫁シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|The festival has come to an end. It's
time to toss the bouquet!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Ladies...let's establish some ground
rules first.$k$pOne: No holding a grudge against the
winner. Two: The last one standing
gets the bouquet.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|But... I never said I even wanted to
get married! I just...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|To battle!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_花嫁シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Congratulations. The Wedding
Bouquet is now yours.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|The moment I've been waiting for!
The prize—it's all mine! Ha!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Commander Anna... Your happiness
is all but assured! I'm so pleased for
you! Well done!$k$pAnd don't forget that invite! I'm so
looking forward to your wedding
feast...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|What are you talking about?$k$pThis is going straight on the auction
block...before it wilts!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Talk about win-win! I make a profit,
the buyer gets a marriage blessing...
Everybody's happy! $k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Well... About that... The bouquet's
blessing goes to today's victor, and
no one else. That's you, Anna.$k$pYou're the one who grabbed it.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Are you kidding me? I don't plan
to get married anytime soon...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|This festival may be over, but if
you propose it, we'll partner with
you, $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Sure. But if you do, at least
let us get changed first.
Is that too much to ask?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|They may not look like it, but these
outfits serve as fine battle dress.
We'll be ready.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Do you think a man would
find this outfit delightful?
Hmm, $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|I hope we'll cross paths again. May
you be blessed with love and joy.$k$p$Sbs150|
